channel.title: Comments on: Tower Storm 0.3 patch preview

item.title: By: jansky
item.dc:creator: jansky
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2014/tower-storm-0-3-patch-preview/#comment-40">towerstorm</a>.
Not really. Having played the new version of Tower Storm (I am a friend of Kevin), I can say it's definitely better than V1, but sometimes it's nice to go back. I will say that I like the minions in V1 a bit more than in V2, but that's just my opinion.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to towerstorm.

Not really. Having played the new version of Tower Storm (I am a friend of Kevin), I can say it’s definitely better than V1, but sometimes it’s nice to go back. I will say that I like the minions in V1 a bit more than in V2, but that’s just my opinion.

item.title: By: towerstorm
item.dc:creator: towerstorm
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2014/tower-storm-0-3-patch-preview/#comment-39">jansky</a>.
It will be retired. Is there something you like more about V1 than this version?
item.content:encoded:
In reply to jansky.

It will be retired. Is there something you like more about V1 than this version?

item.title: By: jansky
item.dc:creator: jansky
item.description: When you release this new version, will you retire V1 or keep it online?
item.content:encoded: When you release this new version, will you retire V1 or keep it online?
